headline.main: Better AIDS Prevention Can Close Health Gap; Life-Style Factors

docs.abstract: William B Grant says gap between health of white and black Americans is due to many factors beside health care, which was focus of Jan 26 article; mentions life-style patterns, a diet heavy in fat, salt and sugar and low in key vitamins and minerals, stress, alcohol consumption, smoking and lack of exercise (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your Jan. 26 news article raises the question of why there is a gap between the health of white and black Americans. While you focused on health care, which of course explains part of the gap, many other factors should also be considered.
